root.message: The SDG_RELATED_INDICATORS field for indicator 6-1-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: All targets under Goal 6, as well as targets 1.2, 1.4, 2.2, 3.2, 3.8, 3.9, 4a, 5.4 and 11.1
